EmailTemplate.description: Email to partner once they've created a lead
EmailTemplate.name: One Partner Creates Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name} Has Received Their Community Solar Application!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Partner_Name__c},
BlueWave has sent {!Lead.Name} their Community Solar Application! We will notify you once {!Lead.Name} has submitted their application.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy
- All of us here at BlueWave
partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com (888) 817-2703
Learn More About Us
bluewavesolar.com
